item.title: Push Notifications pt.2
item.description:
In Part 1 we learned how to send push notifications from Firebase Cloud Messaging console. There are a number of improvements we can make:

  • Show notification when the app in in the foreground
  • Go to a specific view in the app when clicked
  • Buttons directly in the notifications
  • Keep the notification open while the app is open

Let’s get started!
